title: Queen Letizia of Spain oozed sophistication as she husband are appointed honorary citizens of Seoul
text:
Queen Letizia of Spain oozed sophistication as she arrived at a meeting in South Korean hotel with her husband King Felipe VI.

The Spanish royal, 46, cut an elegant figure in an on-trend pointelle-trimmed blouse paired with a knee-length brick red leather skirt.

The royal couple are on their second of a two-day visit to the country to discuss economy and trade links with Spain, and met with the startup members of the Korea Trade-Investment Promotion Agency (KOTRA).

They were later seen attending a ceremonial event appointing Their Majesties The King and Queen of Spain as honorary citizens of the city of Seoul, in the Soul City Hall.

Queen Letizia of Spain, 46, cut an elegant figure in an on-trend pointelle-trimmed blouse paired with a knee-length brick red leather skirt

The royal even matched her eyeshadow to her outfit,donning a brick red eye look and wore red and silver teardrop earrings

This follows their appearance at a gala in the capital hosted by South Korean President Moon Jae-in and wife Kim Jung-soo, yesterday.

Looking typically polished, the mother-of-two sported a white high-neck blouse which boasted embroidered mesh cut out's on the sleeves.

She teamed the shirt with a stylish leather skirt and matching clutch, while wearing shining leather court heels of the same colour.

Letizia added a little glitz to her ensemble with some red and silver teardrop earrings and even matched her eyeshadow to her outfit,donning a brick red eye look with a subtle peach glow on her cheeks.

She attended a meeting in a South Korean hotel where she met with the startup members of the Korea Trade-Investment Promotion Agency (KOTRA)

During the meeting to to discuss bilateral cooperation in sectors including economy and trade, Letizia met First Lady of the Republic of Korea, Kim Jung-sook pose (right)

Letizia seemed to be enjoying her time with the politician and the two were pictures chatting as they got set up for the meeting

Letizia looked gracious as she was warmly greeted by the founding members of the organisation and later posed alongside the First Lady smiling with them for a photo

Her husband Felipe, looked as equally as put together wearing a light grey blazer with a pinstripe shirt and pink patterned tie.

During the meeting to to discuss bilateral cooperation in sectors including economy and trade, Letizia met First Lady of the Republic of Korea, Kim Jung-sook pose.

KOTRA are the leading organisation in the country for promoting small and medium-sized enterprises to explore overseas markets and create global jobs.

Letizia looked gracious as she was warmly greeted by the founding members of the organisation and later posed smiling with them for a photo .

They were later seen attending a ceremonial event appointing Their Majesties The King and Queen of Spain as honorary citizens of the city of Seoul, in the Soul City Hall

The couple looked moved to receive their certificate of honorary citizenship from aMayor Seoul Mayor Park Won-soon

The ceremony also involved receiving special medals representing the royals' honorary citizenship

The mother-of-two applauded her husband King Felipe VI beamed at his new medal and went to shake the Mayor's hand

The royal seemed to be getting on with the First Lady swimmingly as they were snapped laughing at the event as they discussed potential policies.

Later that day, the royal and her husband who ascended the throne in 2014 upon the abdication of his father, King Juan Carlos I, attended a ceremony at Seoul City Hall.

The couple received honorary citizenship from Seoul Mayor Park Won-soon in a ceremony which involved the royals receiving a medal and certificate.

They looked delighted as they were presented with the certification of honorary citizenship and King Felipe shook hands with the Mayor after receiving his medal.

They were later treated to some music performed by a South Korean acoustic guitar duo and seemed to enjoy the performance.

The Kinf,who ascended the throne in 2014 upon the abdication of his father, King Juan Carlos I, made a speech thanking the country for the honor

He was snapped shaking hands with Mayor of Seoul Park Won-soon to thank him for their honory citizenship

The Queen looked radiant with a nude pink lip, light red eye and a with a subtle peach glow on her cheeks
description: Queen Letizia of Spain, 46, and her husband King Felipe, were made honorary citizens of Seoul, during their visit to South Korea to promote trade relations with their home country.
